page_content: The page provides information about the apprenticeship program for computer scientists.
The page lists art exhibitions held in 2012 at the Bündner Kunstmuseum.
The page provides information for host families in Graubünden who are accommodating people seeking protection from Ukraine.
The page lists the team members of the Bündner Kunstmuseum and their roles.
The page provides information on current legal enactments related to taxation in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page provides FAQs about corporate profit and capital tax.
The page provides information about a training course on cataloging with winMedio software.
The page provides information on premium reductions for mandatory health insurance for certain groups of people in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page provides information on biodiversity contributions and networking in the agricultural sector in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses a health promotion and prevention program that focuses on everyday life, health, family, and integration in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page introduces a new calculation tool for capital gains tax on real estate.
